title: Redeemer
description: Abigail Lucia is a single mother whose problems are limited to making ends meet and paying bills and taking care of her two-year-old daughter, Jessie. But when madmen begin to come after Jessie, claiming that she is a force of evil, Abigail realizes that, until now, she really had no problems at all.Enter Michael, an ageless man in Armani with piercing eyes and an eternity's worth of secrets. He is a member of an organizaiton that wishes to help Abigail. But there is a price to be paid fo his assistance. And though Abigail owes him her life, paying that price just might turn out to be the most life-altering thing she has ever done - or will ever do.
author: Heather Killough-Walden
